item.title: CVE-2023-4949|2024-08-02T07:44:53.355Z -- free%20software%20foundation -- grub-legacy
item.description: An attacker with local access to a system (either through a disk or external drive) can present a modified XFS partition to grub-legacy in such a way to exploit a memory corruption in grubâ€™s XFS file system implementation.
